46 bytes per creature. (good joke)
40 bytes of space for the name; 00s pad the rest (central question: is there any marker for the number of zeroes?)
16 bytes of information at the end of each entry:
01: INT max? or STR max? whatever stat was evolved into???
02: blank
03: DEF max
04: blank
05: INT max
06: blank
07: STR max
08: blank
09: HP max
0A: blank

0B: ??
0C: ??
0D: ??
0E: row number?
0F: position in row

FIRST ROW
Thelodus
83 65 83 8D 81 5B 83 5F 83 58 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 10 00 10 00 10 00
10 00 02 00 00 80 02

name: 10bytes
zero: 30bytes
stats: 10 00 10 00 10 00 10 00 10 00
02 00 00 80 02

SECOND ROW
Birkenia
83 72 83 8B 83 50 83 6A 83 41 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 20 00 1C 00 18 00
14 00 04 00 08 C0 01

name: 10 bytes
zero: 30 bytes

stats: 20 00 20 00 1C 00 18 00 14 00
04 00 08 C0 01

83 5A 83 6E 83 89 83 58 83 73 83 58 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 1C 00 20 00 1C 00
18 00 04 00 04 C0 02

name: 12 bytes
zero: 28 bytes

stats: 20 00 1C 00 20 00 1C 00 18 00
04 00 04 C0 02

1C 00 04 00 02 C0 03

04 00 02 C0 03
